content: you can use any kind of yarn for this pattern no face amigurumi is about 9 cm 3 5 inches tall used stitches magic_ring = magic_ring chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet increase/2 single_crochet increase = increase 2 single_crochet per stitch 3 single_crochet increase = 3 single_crochet per stitch decrease = decrease single_crochet across two stitches slip_stitch = slip_stitch
